items.sentence: Tom has never dated a girl whose name ends with an "s."
I have important business to take care of in my office.
I\'m so glad Tom was able to get his driver\'s license.
I\'m so tired that I don\'t feel like studying tonight.
I\'m starting to think we\'ll never be able to do this.
I wasn\'t as desperate to do that as Tom thought I was.
I don\'t like living in Boston and Tom doesn\'t either.
I don\'t need to know why Tom doesn\'t want to do that.
I don\'t really have to go with Tom, but I\'m going to.
You didn\'t have to tell me why because I already knew.
